articles.author: The White House
articles.title: Statement from President Biden on Dr. Rochelle Walensky - The White House
articles.description: Dr. Walensky has saved lives with her steadfast and unwavering focus on the health of every American. As Director of the CDC, she led a complex organization on the frontlines of a once-in-a-generation pandemic with honesty and integrity. She marshalled our fi…
articles.content: Dr. Walensky has saved lives with her steadfast and unwavering focus on the health of every American. As Director of the CDC, she led a complex organization on the frontlines of a once-in-a-generatio… [+388 chars]
